items.name: TM01
items.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

items.name: TM02
items.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

items.name: TM03
items.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

items.name: TM04
items.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

items.name: TM05
items.description: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends the battle.

items.name: TM06
items.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

items.name: TM07
items.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except Ice types.

items.name: TM08
items.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

items.name: TM09
items.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

items.name: TM10
items.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

items.name: TM11
items.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves and weakening Water-type moves.

items.name: TM12
items.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

items.name: TM13
items.description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

items.name: TM14
items.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them frozen.

items.name: TM15
items.description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

items.name: TM16
items.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

items.name: TM17
items.description: The user protects itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

items.name: TM18
items.description: The user summons a heavy rain for five turns, powering up Water-type moves and weakening Fire-type ones.

items.name: TM19
items.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

items.name: TM20
items.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

items.name: TM21
items.description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

items.name: TM22
items.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

items.name: TM23
items.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

items.name: TM24
items.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

items.name: TM25
items.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave them with paralysis.

items.name: TM26
items.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

items.name: TM27
items.description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

items.name: TM28
items.description: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

items.name: TM29
items.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM30
items.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM31
items.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

items.name: TM32
items.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

items.name: TM33
items.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

items.name: TM34
items.description: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

items.name: TM35
items.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

items.name: TM36
items.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

items.name: TM37
items.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

items.name: TM38
items.description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave them with a burn.

items.name: TM39
items.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

items.name: TM40
items.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

items.name: TM41
items.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

items.name: TM42
items.description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

items.name: TM43
items.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

items.name: TM44
items.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

items.name: TM45
items.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

items.name: TM46
items.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously.

items.name: TM47
items.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

items.name: TM48
items.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

items.name: TM49
items.description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

items.name: TM50
items.description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

items.name: TM51
items.description: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

items.name: TM52
items.description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM53
items.description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM54
items.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

items.name: TM55
items.description: If the target's HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

items.name: TM56
items.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

items.name: TM57
items.description: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining charge to raise its Sp. Atk.

items.name: TM58
items.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

items.name: TM59
items.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

items.name: TM60
items.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

items.name: TM61
items.description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

items.name: TM62
items.description: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM63
items.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

items.name: TM64
items.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

items.name: TM65
items.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

items.name: TM66
items.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

items.name: TM67
items.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

items.name: TM68
items.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

items.name: TM69
items.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

items.name: TM70
items.description: The user flashes a light that lowers the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

items.name: TM71
items.description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

items.name: TM72
items.description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

items.name: TM73
items.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

items.name: TM74
items.description: The user tackles with a high-speed spin. This move is stronger the slower the user is than the target.

items.name: TM75
items.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

items.name: TM76
items.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team that hurt Pokémon that switch in.

items.name: TM77
items.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

items.name: TM78
items.description: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

items.name: TM79
items.description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

items.name: TM80
items.description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make them flinch.

items.name: TM81
items.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

items.name: TM82
items.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

items.name: TM83
items.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed of those hit.

items.name: TM84
items.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison them.

items.name: TM85
items.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by half the damage dealt.

items.name: TM86
items.description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the strong the move is.

items.name: TM87
items.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

items.name: TM88
items.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

items.name: TM89
items.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

items.name: TM90
items.description: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP. The substitute serves as a decoy.

items.name: TM91
items.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

items.name: TM92
items.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

items.name: TM93
items.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

items.name: TM94
items.description: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.

items.name: TM95
items.description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

items.name: TM96
items.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

items.name: TM97
items.description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers, such as Reflect, and lowers their evasiveness.

items.name: TM98
items.description: The user attacks with a punch that may lower the target's Defense stat.

items.name: TM99
items.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

items.name: TM100
items.description: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused.

items.name: HM01
items.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

items.name: HM02
items.description: The user soars and then strikes on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

items.name: HM03
items.description: Attacks everything by swamping the surroundings with a giant wave. This can also be used to cross water.

items.name: HM04
items.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

items.name: HM05
items.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

items.name: HM06
items.description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second. It can be used to dive underwater.

items.name: Dire Hit 2
items.description: It sharply raises the critical-hit ratio. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: Dire Hit 3
items.description: It greatly raises the critical-hit ratio. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

items.name: Guard Spec.
items.description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokémon for five turns after use.

items.name: Reset Urge
items.description: When used, it restores any stat changes of an ally Pokémon.

items.name: Ability Urge
items.description: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokémon.

items.name: Item Urge
items.description: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to use its held item.

items.name: Item Drop
items.description: When used, it causes an ally Pokémon to drop a held item.

items.name: Blue Flute
items.description: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokémon from sleep.

items.name: Yellow Flute
items.description: A yellow flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of confusion.

items.name: Red Flute
items.description: A red flute made from blown glass. Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out of infatuation.

items.name: Poké Doll
items.description: A doll that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

items.name: Fluffy Tail
items.description: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

items.name: Poké Toy
items.description: An item that attracts Pokémon. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild Pokémon.

items.name: Bicycle
items.description: A folding Bicycle that enables much faster movement than the Running Shoes.

items.name: Old Rod
items.description: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.name: Good Rod
items.description: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.name: Super Rod
items.description: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

items.name: Itemfinder
items.description: A device used for finding items. If there is a hidden item nearby when it is used, it emits a signal.

items.name: Dowsing Machine
items.description: It checks for unseen items in the area and makes noise and lights when it finds something.

items.name: Poké Radar
items.description: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.

items.name: Town Map
items.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.

items.name: Escape Rope
items.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

items.name: Coin Case
items.description: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 99,999 coins.

items.name: Poké Flute
items.description: A flute that is said to instantly awaken any Pokémon. It has a lovely tone.

items.name: Soot Sack
items.description: A sack used to gather and hold volcanic ash.

items.name: Silph Scope
items.description: A scope that makes unseeable Pokémon visible. It is made by Silph Co.

items.name: Devon Scope
items.description: A device by Devon that signals any unseeable Pokémon.

items.name: Squirt Bottle
items.description: A watering can shaped like a Squirtle. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.

items.name: Sprayduck
items.description: A watering can shaped like a Psyduck. It helps promote healthy growth of Berries planted in soft soil.

items.name: Wailmer Pail
items.description: A nifty watering pail. Use it to promote strong growth in Berries planted in soft soil.

items.name: Sprinklotad
items.description: A watering can shaped like a Lotad. It helps promote the healthy growth of any Berries planted in soft soil.

items.name: Gracidea
items.description: A flower sometimes bundled in bouquets to convey gratitude on special occasions like birthdays.

items.name: Reveal Glass
items.description: A glass that reveals the truth. It is a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon back to its original shape.

items.name: Prison Bottle
items.description: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.

items.name: Rotom Catalog
items.description: A catalog of devices that Rotom like. Use the catalog to have Rotom hop in and out of the devices listed within.

items.name: Zygarde Cube
items.description: An item in which Zygarde Cores and Cells are gathered. You can also use it to change Zygarde's forms.

items.name: DNA Splicers
items.description: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

items.name: DNA Splicers
items.description: A splicer that separates Kyurem and a certain Pokémon when they have been fused.

items.name: N-Solarizer
items.description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Solgaleo.

items.name: N-Solarizer
items.description: A machine to separate Necrozma, which needed light, from Solgaleo.

items.name: N-Lunarizer
items.description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Lunala.

items.name: N-Lunarizer
items.description: A machine to separate Necrozma, which needed light, from Lunala.

items.name: Reins of Unity
items.description: Reins that people presented to the king. They unite Calyrex with its beloved steed.

items.name: Reins of Unity
items.description: Reins that people presented to the king. They separate Calyrex and its beloved steed.

items.name: Oval Charm
items.description: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Eggs being found at the Day Care.

items.name: Shiny Charm
items.description: A shiny charm said to increase the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon.

items.name: Catching Charm
items.description: A charm said to increase the chance of getting a critical catch. The charm doesn't shake much.

items.name: Exp. Charm
items.description: A charm that increases the Exp. Points that Pokémon can get. A machine-like object is inside it.

items.name: Pokémon Box Link
items.description: A device that allows you to access the Pokémon storage system. There are some places where it won't work.

items.name: Aurora Ticket
items.description: A ticket required to board the ship to Doxy Island. It glows beautifully.

items.name: Old Sea Map
items.description: A faded sea chart that shows the way to a certain island.
